body.draft-comment: This topic will describe each WebHelp template's components.

draft-comment.author: webapp
draft-comment.b: Which are the Webhelp components and what is generated for each of them?

body.p: The WebHelp template's components are listed below.

section.title: Publication title (webhelp_main_title)
section.p: This component will be replaced when publishing the WebHelp output to the title the of the publication. For the DITA case it corresponds to the DITA map title.
In the HTML output, for this component will be generate a 'div' element with the class webhelp_main_title that will hold the title of the publication like in the following sample:
section.codeblock: Eclipse content aggregated by a map
section.p: This component will be expanded on all WebHelp template pages: main page template, topic page template, search page template and index terms template.

section.title: Publication logo (webhelp_logo)
section.p: This component is used to generate in the Webhelp output an image for the company or publication logo. The path to the image is specified through the WebHelp parameter webhelp.logo.image. Also, if you specify the webhelp.logo.image.target.urlparameter then a link to the specified value will be generated when you hover the image.
A sample HTML output for this component is listed below:

Where next parameters were specified:
webhelp.logo.image = oxygen.logo.png
webhelp.logo.image.target.url = http://oxygenxml.com
Oxygen XML Editor is the title of the publication
This component will be expanded on all WebHelp template pages: main page template, topic page template, search page template and index terms template.
